TopicTitle: SAS Action Group not working, others are okay

Articles.Content:
Not sure if anybody ran into this, but basically my SAS action group does absolutely nothing. I connected all toggles (gimbal, deploy control surface, reaction wheel), as it should be, totally normal things. When I press it in the VAB or on the launch pad it just simply doesn't toggle the settings on the parts. RCS does work, gears too.

I'm not sure what the problem is, restarted the game and everything. It just suddenly stopped working. I actually managed to get some fun out of the game for 2 hours building STS and this happens...
